name: Through Time and Space (TimeSauce, SleepyUFO)
description:
A strange man, calling himself Dr BloopADoop, appeared before you and is trying to get your help in finding the lost technology of the once-forgotten world. Venture into this new and unknown world and try to find ways to preserve the so-called lost technology.

Controls:

AWSD - move

LMB - shoot

SPACE/ENTER - progress/end the conversation

Art by - TimeSauce

Music, sounds and voice acting by - SleepyUFO and Jen-ocide

Programmed by - TimeSauce

Everything was done from scratch, EXCEPT for a few free sound effects and sprites from the internet used as references.
